item.title: Better, faster, stronger
item.description: Howdy y’all! The basis for this new design and adventure of automation all started with a random late night at Upwork preparing for a massive site “forklift” to AWS from our very outdated datacenter. I knew vacation would be needed after said migration. So I booked and began my 15 day vacation to Iceland, Germany & Spain for a few days after 48 hours of zero downtime. On my flight to Germany, I decided to re-launch all of thehar.
